column6: Question

column5: Young couple, $120K income, $400-450K budget, worried about down payment
column6: We've saved $40K - should we wait another year to save more? What if prices go up?

column5: Single professional, $85K income, confused about process
column6: I don't understand closing costs or escrow - can you give me a simple breakdown?

column5: Couple with toddler, 42% DTI, student debt
column6: Our DTI is 42% - are we setting ourselves up to be house poor?
Every house in good school districts is $350K+. Should I just forget buying?
I'm seeing 4-5% cap rates. Why buy now vs waiting for market correction?
How do I know if a property is a good investment? What metrics should I look at?
Getting outbid by cash buyers on every property. Should I pause and wait?
What neighborhoods have best rent-to-price ratios? Need turnkey since remote.
Should we list first or make contingent offer? What works in this market?
Won't we get killed on capital gains? What if we downsize then prices crash?
column20: Properly defers to CPA on taxes

column6: We only have $110K equity. Can we make the jump to $550K without being stretched?
How can I make $500K decision after seeing houses for 2 days? Rent instead?
Why is your market better than Austin/Raleigh? Need data not sales pitch.
They paid $380K in 2019, now asking $515K. That's insane markup - why would I pay?
Headlines say housing crash coming. Wouldn't I be stupid to buy right now?
I found cheaper houses on Zillow - why are we looking at expensive ones?
What if we looked at that $465K house? Or condos? What should we do?
It's in flood zone with foundation issues but great location. Should I go for it?
Should I pull from 401k for bigger down payment? What would you do?
Can you show me areas where there are families like us? You know what I mean.
What does this contract clause mean? What are my legal rights if this goes south?
